DOC.brief_summary: The biopsychosocial model well establish chronic low back pain ( CLBP ) research . Nevertheless , researcher date overlook biopsychosocial aspect Inflammatory Low Back pain ( ILBP ) . Most health care provider biologically orient treatment ILBP , neglect possible multidimensional nature . It true people ILBP may present complex pain physical limitation chronic non-specific low back pain ( CNSLBP ) , remain unexplored whether limitation affect pain factor affect CNSLBP patient . This study aim explore compare biopsychosocial back pain profile adult ILBP CNSLBP .
DOC.brief_title: Biopsychosocial Exploration Pain Profiles Inflammatory Chronic Non-specific Axial Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: This multicentre case-control study compare back pain patient ankylose spondylitis CNSLBP . A multidimensional pain assessment conduct patient group . Each patient assess one occasion experience physiotherapist .
DOC.criteria: Adult 18 65 year age Low back pain > 3 month On stable medication Ability walk independently without assistive device Specific inclusion criterion AS group : clinical diagnosis ankylose spondylitis rheumatologist Specific inclusion CNSLBP group : clinical diagnosis physician CLBP Spinal surgery compression fracture within last 6 month Cauda equine conus medullaris syndrome Severe musculoskeletal condition affect upper and/or lower limb , severe inflammatory arthritis peripheral joint Severe osteoporosis Leglength discrepancy Cancer Morbid obesity , pregnancy Progressive neurological disease Psychiatric disease and/or cognitive limitation could affect ability complete study questionnaire Inability read and/or understand English language Severe cardiac , respiratory neurological disease Uncontrolled epilepsy Specific exclusion criterion CNSLBP group : Spondyloarthropathy , structural abnormality lumbar spine result serious neurological dysfunction , stage IIIIV lumbar disc herniation , grade IIIIV spondylolisthesis
